programme.title: Robert Maxwell and Fred MacMurray
programme.short_synopsis: Profiles of Robert Maxwell and Fred MacMurray, who both passed away in 1991.
programme.medium_synopsis: Memories of British publisher Robert Maxwell (1923-1991) and Double Indemnity actor Fred MacMurray (1908-1991).
